CustomField.description: Calcualte number of consultants for next month (This month + 1)
CustomField.formula: IF(AND( TEXT(StageName) != "5 - Awarded",IsClosed = false,Assignment_Start_Date__c < TODAY() + 30, Assignment_End_Date__c > TODAY()+ 30), Consultants__c * Probability__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Consultants 30-60d
